Getting Started With SMART App Development

This guide is for developers who want to get started writing medical apps with SMART. It will lead you through the process of setting up your environment and building your first SMART app. You will test your app against the cloud-hosted SMART reference container. This guide assume you have general software develoment skills but no prior familiarity with SMART or medical informatics.

Outline of the Guide

  • Setup
  • Quickstart Example
  • Extended Tutorials
  • Where to Go Next

We recommend following the guide in order.

Next: setting up your environment
